headline: What Aeva Technologies (AEVA)'s Shift to 4D LiDAR Solutions and $100M Funding Means for Shareholders
summary: Aeva Technologies announced an exclusive partnership with D2 Traffic Technologies to deliver 4D LiDAR-based smart infrastructure solutions across the U.S. and secured a US$100 million investment from funds managed by Apollo Global Management to accelerate the sales and deployment of its LiDAR technology. These actions mark a shift for Aeva from a LiDAR sensor supplier to a full-solution provider, offering integrated sensing, perception, and analytics for transportation infrastructure. We'll...
